appendTo.description: The parent container to append the modal to. Defaults to document.body (Type: HTMLElement | (() => HTMLElement))

aria-label.description: Aria label for the about modal.  This should be used when no productName prop is provided

backgroundImageSrc.description: The URL or file path of the image for the background

brandImageAlt.description: The alternate text of the brand image

brandImageSrc.description: The URL of the image for the brand

children.description: Content rendered inside the about modal (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the about modal

closeButtonAriaLabel.description: Set aria label to the close button

hasNoContentContainer.description: Prevents the about modal from rendering content inside a container; allows for more flexible layouts

isOpen.description: Flag to show the about modal

onClose.description: A callback for when the close button is clicked (Type: (event: React.MouseEvent | MouseEvent | KeyboardEvent) => void)
